channel.title: Snake Vs Hawk
channel.description:
This is not a Complaint about StubernSnake. There is no Player trouble. But There is something odd going on with him and hawk. I cant hawk him. This came up when we were fighting and i posted pics of stuff I saw him build that hawk couldn't identify. Now i have definite proof.
In the last 5 days he has built a house in the Dome. I was looking at it just now and he was changing the floor i guess and I wanted to make sure he wasn't greifed. so i hawked it. His name dident come up at all. Here are a few screen shots that don't show him at all. The shots even show the trees that were there before the house was.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I3yb0.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/uG6bU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kbWVk.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZEFPF.png[/img]
I even went around the whole dome TRYING to find a hawk tag for him and couldn't find one at all? Now how could a player get around showing up on Hawk? This should be looked in to or hawk tool should be replaced.

item.title: Snake Vs Hawk
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Ive noticed this as well, ive tried hawking blocks before that I KNOW had been edited in the past day and it showed no results

Read full topic

item.title: Snake Vs Hawk
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

It shows some things but not others. It’s like not everything saves block damage/place wise.

I’m having trouble rolling back as well, it just says no results found for everything I’ve tried to do.

Read full topic

item.title: Snake Vs Hawk
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

So you mean that /hawk tool doesn’t show you things? Not that it doesn’t show you things for only certain players?

Read full topic

item.title: Snake Vs Hawk
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

It’s not just for snake, it’s everyone for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Snake Vs Hawk
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I have no idea, I don’t even think there is a configuration option for hawk to ignore certain players.

Read full topic

item.title: Snake Vs Hawk

item.description:
@Tom wrote:

I’ve noticed this as well, I thought it was just me but this confirms it’s a genuine problem.

Read full topic

item.title: Snake Vs Hawk
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

This is not a Complaint about StubernSnake. There is no Player trouble. But There is something odd going on with him and hawk.
I cant hawk him.
This came up when we were fighting and i posted pics of stuff I saw him build that hawk couldn’t identify.
Now i have definite proof.

In the last 5 days he has built a house in the Dome. I was looking at it just now and he was changing the floor i guess and I wanted to make sure he wasn’t greifed. so i hawked it. His name dident come up at all.
Here are a few screen shots that don’t show him at all. The shots even show the trees that were there before the house was.

I3yb0.jpg1680×988

uG6bU.png1680×988

kbWVk.png1680×988

ZEFPF.png1680×988

I even went around the whole dome TRYING to find a hawk tag for him and couldn’t find one at all?
Now how could a player get around showing up on Hawk?
This should be looked in to or hawk tool should be replaced.

Read full topic
